professional_summary: Experienced professional with expertise in program management, compliance, and database administration. Strong skills in data management, documentation, and communication.

key_responsibilities: Plans and executes programs for a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization.
Researches and applies for funding.

work_experience.company: KAIROS CAPITAL, LLC (formerly Bedrock Management Solutions)
key_responsibilities: Led property management personnel to identify
minimize and resolve operational risks.
Reduced manual invoice entries by 75% and improved monthly financial report generation by 80% through process improvement.
Assisted accounting with accounts receivables
invoice payment processing
and monthly financial reports.
Communicated with vendors to resolve payment and billing issues.
Analyzed data and generated outcome reports for medical education programs to meet closeout timelines.
Prepared and submitted grant proposals for oncology educational programs.
Managed development and implementation of an ethical company-wide compliance program.
Standardized and documented processes for data collection and analysis
document storage
and program reconciliation.
Initiated audit processes
reducing program closeouts from 60+ days to 30 days.
Audited data and generated transparency reports.
Optimized report generation from overnight to real-time.
Validated and maintained databases for 10k+ healthcare providers.
